keyId.description: The key ID in a checkpoint, as a prefix to the signature. SHOULD be 4 bytes long, as a truncated hash.

CheckpointKeyId.title: Checkpoint Key Id
CheckpointKeyId.description: The checkpoint key ID, following the specification described here for ECDSA and Ed25519 signatures: https://github.com/C2SP/C2SP/blob/main/signed-note.md#signatures For RSA signatures, the key ID will match the ECDSA format of the hashed DER-encoded SPKI public key. Publicly witnessed logs MUST NOT use RSA-signed checkpoints, since witnesses do not support RSA signatures. This is provided for convenience. Clients can also calculate the checkpoint key ID given the log's public key.
